messages.content: Hey, tell me who is Arjun Kava

Arjun Kava is the founder of My Fav AI, an artificial intelligence start-up company. He is also a software engineer and an entrepreneur. He received his Bachelor's in Computer Science and Engineering from the renowned Instutute of Technology, Kharagpur in 2013.
What is product led sales and how it can be implemented for devtools?

Product led sales is a sales model in which a company sells its products or services as a part of a larger package. The customer buys the whole package instead of buying the individual components. In this model, the sales staff focuses on hitting a quota and product managers become the lead point of contact with the customer.
